mean_en: relating to the general principles or ideas of a subject rather than the practical uses of those ideas
word_etyma: theor考虑+et=em变体，获得+ ical ...的 →theoret=theorem考虑后获得的结果=定理 + ical ...的 → a.理论(上)的
sentence: He always does things on the basis of books; it is so theoretical.
sentence_trans: 他总是按书上说的做，太理论化了。
